00051 const char PAINT_CURSOR_SCULPT[3] = {255, 100, 100};
00052 const char PAINT_CURSOR_VERTEX_PAINT[3] = {255, 255, 255};
00053 const char PAINT_CURSOR_WEIGHT_PAINT[3] = {200, 200, 255};
00054 const char PAINT_CURSOR_TEXTURE_PAINT[3] = {255, 255, 255};
00055 
00056 Paint *paint_get_active(Scene *sce)
00057 {
00058     if (sce) {
00059         ToolSettings *ts = sce->toolsettings;
00060         
00061         if (sce->basact && sce->basact->object) {
00062             switch(sce->basact->object->mode) {
00063             case OB_MODE_SCULPT:
00064                 return &ts->sculpt->paint;
00065             case OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT:
00066                 return &ts->vpaint->paint;
00067             case OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT:
00068                 return &ts->wpaint->paint;
00069             case OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT:
00070                 return &ts->imapaint.paint;
00071             case OB_MODE_EDIT:
00072                 if (ts->use_uv_sculpt)
00073                     return &ts->uvsculpt->paint;
00074                 else
00075                     return &ts->imapaint.paint;
00076             }
00077         }
00078 
00079         /* default to image paint */
00080         return &ts->imapaint.paint;
00081     }
00082 
00083     return NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00086 Brush *paint_brush(Paint *p)
00087 {
00088     return p ? p->brush : NULL;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void paint_brush_set(Paint *p, Brush *br)
00092 {
00093     if (p) {
00094         id_us_min((ID *)p->brush);
00095         id_us_plus((ID *)br);
00096         p->brush= br;
00097     }
00098 }
00099 
00100 /* are we in vertex paint or weight pain face select mode? */
00101 int paint_facesel_test(Object *ob)
00102 {
00103     return ( (ob != NULL) &&
00104              (ob->type == OB_MESH) &&
00105              (ob->data != NULL) &&
00106              (((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK) &&
00107              (ob->mode & (OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT|OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT|OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT))
00108              );
00109 }
00110 
00111 /* are we in weight paint vertex select mode? */
00112 int paint_vertsel_test(Object *ob)
00113 {
00114     return ( (ob != NULL) &&
00115              (ob->type == OB_MESH) &&
00116              (ob->data != NULL) &&
00117              (((Mesh *)ob->data)->editflag & ME_EDIT_VERT_SEL) &&
00118              (ob->mode & OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT)
00119              );
00120 }
00121 
00122 void paint_init(Paint *p, const char col[3])
00123 {
00124     Brush *brush;
00125 
00126     /* If there's no brush, create one */
00127     brush = paint_brush(p);
00128     if (brush == NULL)
00129         brush= add_brush("Brush");
00130     paint_brush_set(p, brush);
00131 
00132     memcpy(p->paint_cursor_col, col, 3);
00133     p->paint_cursor_col[3] = 128;
00134 
00135     p->flags |= PAINT_SHOW_BRUSH;
00136 }
00137 
00138 void free_paint(Paint *paint)
00139 {
00140     id_us_min((ID *)paint->brush);
00141 }
00142 
00143 /* called when copying scene settings, so even if 'src' and 'tar' are the same
00144  * still do a id_us_plus(), rather then if we were copying betweem 2 existing
00145  * scenes where a matching value should decrease the existing user count as
00146  * with paint_brush_set() */
00147 void copy_paint(Paint *src, Paint *tar)
00148 {
00149     tar->brush= src->brush;
00150     id_us_plus((ID *)tar->brush);
00151 }
00152 
00153 /* returns non-zero if any of the face's vertices
00154  * are hidden, zero otherwise */
00155 int paint_is_face_hidden(const MFace *f, const MVert *mvert)
00156 {
00157     return ((mvert[f->v1].flag & ME_HIDE) ||
00158             (mvert[f->v2].flag & ME_HIDE) ||
00159             (mvert[f->v3].flag & ME_HIDE) ||
00160             (f->v4 && (mvert[f->v4].flag & ME_HIDE)));
00161 }
00162 
00163 /* returns non-zero if any of the corners of the grid
00164  * face whose inner corner is at (x,y) are hidden,
00165  * zero otherwise */
00166 int paint_is_grid_face_hidden(const unsigned int *grid_hidden,
00167                               int gridsize, int x, int y)
00168 {
00169     /* skip face if any of its corners are hidden */
00170     return (BLI_BITMAP_GET(grid_hidden, y * gridsize + x) ||
00171             BLI_BITMAP_GET(grid_hidden, y * gridsize + x+1) ||
00172             BLI_BITMAP_GET(grid_hidden, (y+1) * gridsize + x+1) ||
00173             BLI_BITMAP_GET(grid_hidden, (y+1) * gridsize + x));
00174 }
